overview_of_class: This course is an introduction to phonological analysis, dynamics of articulation and dialect variations, focusing on training in transcription of English speech sounds. The course is conducted completely online. It will be asynchronous; students can participate in discussions and complete assignments by working at their own pace, as long as deadlines are met. A technology fee will be added to tuition.
name: Phonetics
title: SCS CSD 305-DL-12 Phonetics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is an introduction to phonological analysis, dynamics of articulation and dialect variations, focusing on training in transcription of English speech sounds. The course is conducted completely online. It will be asynchronous; students can participate in discussions and complete assignments by working at their own pace, as long as deadlines are met. A technology fee will be added to tuition.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: This course is restricted to students in the Prespeech Pathology program. Other SPS students may register using a permission number, if room is available. Please contact spsundergraduate@northwestern.edu for more information.

subject: CSD
